newsitem.title: USA: U.S. chain store sales up 0.6 pct - BTM/Schroders.
newsitem.headline: U.S. chain store sales up 0.6 pct - BTM/Schroders.

text.p: U.S. chain store sales rose 0.6 percent in the week ended March 29 from the prior week, according to the seasonally adjusted BTM/Schroders weekly chain store sales index.
Sales for the week were up 7.4 percent on a year-over-year basis, while the month-to-date index was up 1.3 percent from the prior month.
The report, which is normally embargoed for 0900 EST/1400 GMT, was again released early by other news services.
